name: Heistmaster
description:
A simple shooter with a hopefully not generic twist

... with 6 levels as well!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys to move

Left click to shoot

Space to toggle between modes

R to reset

To select level click on the small arrows until you're at the level you want, then click heist!

How to play

Main mechanic: You can both move and shoot, but using one will take you out of  control of the other.

In "Shoot" mode you can freely aim and shoot but slide and bounce based on your last direction

In "Move" mode you can freely move but will keep shooting in the last direction you aimed. Need a hint which angle to bounce? Try using the marks on the floor.

Side mechanics: 

Bullets collide in midair and destroy each other. You can use them as a very thin shield

There are (robot) guards that shoot you. You are a one shot kill and so are they

To win the level and unlock the next you must get to the large gold pile. For an extra challenge you can also try picking up all the gold pieces along the way. But careful not to shoot a civilian!
